02 FAQ

Questions? We've got answers.

Everything you need to know before starting—whether you're new to Astro or just new to this course.

Do I need any prior experience with Astro?

Nope! This course is beginner-friendly. We’ll start from scratch and guide you through everything you need to know to get comfortable with Astro.

How long will I have access to the course?

You’ll get lifetime access. Buy once, and revisit the lessons anytime you want—even after we add future updates.

Do I get a certificate after completing the course?

Yes! Once you complete all the lessons and projects, you’ll receive a downloadable certificate of completion you can share anywhere.

Can I use this with my team?

Absolutely. The Scale and Enterprise plans include team access, progress tracking, and admin features to support team learning.

What if I don’t like the course?

We offer a 14-day refund policy—no questions asked. Just reach out and we’ll take care of it.

What tools do I need to follow along?

You’ll need a code editor like VS Code and a modern browser. We’ll walk you through setting everything else up step by step.

Is this course up to date with the latest version of Astro?

Yes. We actively update the course to match the latest features and best practices in Astro. You’ll also get access to any future updates.

Can I preview the course before buying?

We offer a few free lessons so you can get a feel for the format and teaching style before committing to a plan.

Do you cover deployment?

Yes, we’ll guide you through deploying your Astro sites using platforms like Vercel and Netlify—step by step.

How long does the course take to complete?

It depends on your pace. Most learners complete it in a few weeks, but you’re free to go faster or slower depending on your schedule.
